Profiles

App to manage profiles

get profiles list

To retrieve the profiles’ list, you can use the profile.index() function:

profile.index(request)

Return the list of profiles.

Parameters:

request (request) – automatically filled with url “profiles/”

Returns:

The index template with all profiles.

Return type:

view

get a profile

To retrieve a profile information, you can use the profile() function:

profile(request, username)

Return a profile detail, with profile favorite_city and associated user’s informations

Parameters:

  • request (request) – automatically filled with url “profiles/<str:username>/”

  • username (str()) – associated username to the selected profile

Returns:

The profile template with profile object.

Return type:

view
